question: Which among the following is not true about State Legislative Council in India?
option1: The Council is a Permanent House & one-third of the members retire in two years.
option2: Members of local bodies elect one-third of the total number of members of the legislative council
option3: If a state legislative council is to be created or abolished , a resolution to that effect is to be first passed by the State legislature by a two-third majority
answer: The Council is a Permanent House & one-third of the members retire in two years.
explanation: The Council is permanent House & TWO-THIRD of the members retire in two years.
